border.description: Set to true to use borders.

rounded.description: Use rounded borders when border is true.

highlight.description: Background highlight group of float window.

borderhighlight.description: Border highlight group of float window.

close.description: Set to true to draw close icon

maxWidth.description: Maximum width of float window, include border.

maxHeight.description: Maximum height of float window, include border.

focusable.description: Enable focus by user actions (wincmds, mouse events), neovim only.

shadow.description: Drop shadow effect by blending with the background, neovim only.

winblend.description: Enables pseudo-transparency by set 'winblend' option of window, neovim only.

cwd.description: Working directory of languageserver, absolute path or relative to workspace folder, use workspace root by default

disableDynamicRegister.description: Disable dynamic registerCapability feature for this languageserver to avoid duplicated feature regstration.

disableSnippetCompletion.description: Disable completion snippet feature for this languageserver, the languageserver may not respect it.

stdioEncoding.description: Encoding used for stdio of child process.

rootPatterns.description: Root patterns used to resolve rootPath from current file, default to workspace root

requireRootPattern.description: If true, doesn't start server when root pattern not found.

ignoredRootPaths.description: Absolute root paths that language server should not use as rootPath, higher priority than rootPatterns.

filetypes.description: Supported filetypes, add * in array for all filetypes.

additionalSchemes.description: Additional uri schemes, default schemes including file & untitled.

revealOutputChannelOn.description: Configure message level to show the output channel buffer

progressOnInitialization.description: Enable progress report on languageserver initialize.

trace.server.description: Trace level of communication between server and client

module.description: Absolute path of javascript file, should works in IPC mode

execArgv.description: Argv passed to node when using module, normally used for debugging, ex: ["--nolazy", "--inspect-brk=6045"]

transport.description: Transport kind used by server, could be 'ipc', 'stdio', 'socket' and 'pipe'

transportPort.description: Port number used when transport is 'socket'

command.description: Executable in $PATH to start languageserver, should not used with module

http.proxy.description: The proxy setting to use. If not set, will be inherited from the `http_proxy` and `https_proxy` environment variables.

http.proxyStrictSSL.description: Controls whether the proxy server certificate should be verified against the list of supplied CAs

http.proxyAuthorization.description: The value to send as the `Proxy-Authorization` header for every network request.

http.proxyCA.description: CA (file) to use as Certificate Authority

npm.binPath.description: Command or absolute path to npm or yarn.

suggest.selection.description: Controls how suggestions are pre-selected when showing the suggest list.

suggest.enablePreselect.description: Enable preselect feature of LSP, only works on neovim, required for suggest.selection config.

suggest.enablePreview.description: Add preview option to completeopt, default: false.

suggest.floatEnable.description: Enable floating window for documentation when possible.

suggest.floatConfig.description: Configure style of documentation window for complete item.

suggest.labelMaxLength.description: Max length of abbr that shown as label of complete item.

suggest.detailMaxLength.description: Max length of detail that should be shown in popup menu.

suggest.detailField.description: Where to show the detail text of CompleteItem from LS.

suggest.disableKind.description: Remove kind field from vim complete item.

suggest.disableMenu.description: Remove menu field from vim complete item.

suggest.disableMenuShortcut.description: Disable shortcut of completion source in menu.

suggest.snippetIndicator.description: The character used in abbr of complete item to indicate the item could be expand as snippet.

suggest.maxCompleteItemCount.description: Maximum number of complete items shown in vim

suggest.preferCompleteThanJumpPlaceholde.description: Confirm completion instead of jump to next placeholder when completion is activated.

suggest.fixInsertedWord.description: Make inserted word replace word characters after cursor position.

suggest.localityBonus.description: Boost suggestions that appear closer to the cursor position.

suggest.triggerAfterInsertEnter.description: Trigger completion after InsertEnter, auto trigger should be 'always' to enable this option

suggest.minTriggerInputLength.description: Minimal input length for trigger completion, default 1

suggest.triggerCompletionWait.description: Wait time between text change and completion start, cancel completion when text changed during wait.

suggest.acceptSuggestionOnCommitCharacte.description: Controls whether suggestions should be accepted on commit characters. For example, in JavaScript, the semi-colon (`;`) can be a commit character that accepts a suggestion and types that character. Requires CompleteChanged event to work.

suggest.noselect.description: Not make vim select first item on completion start

suggest.keepCompleteopt.description: When enabled, completeopt is not overridden, auto completion will be disabled if completeopt doesn't have noinsert and noselect.

suggest.lowPrioritySourceLimit.description: Max items count for source priority lower than 90.

suggest.highPrioritySourceLimit.description: Max items count for source priority bigger than or equal to 90.

suggest.removeDuplicateItems.description: Remove completion items with duplicated word for all sources, snippet items are excluded.

suggest.defaultSortMethod.description: Default sorting behavior for suggested completion items.

suggest.snippetsSupport.description: Set to false to disable snippets support of completion.

suggest.completionItemKindLabels.description: Set custom labels to completion items' kinds.

suggest.invalidInsertCharacters.description: Invalid character for strip valid word when inserting text of complete item.

suggest.asciiCharactersOnly.description: Trigger suggest with ASCII characters only

suggest.ignoreRegexps.description: Regexps to ignore when trigger suggest

documentHighlight.priority.description: Match priority used by document highlight, see ':h matchadd'

documentHighlight.timeout.description: Timeout for document highlight, in milliseconds.

colors.filetypes.description: Filetypes that should be enabled for colors highlight feature, use "*" for all filetypes.

colors.highlightPriority.description: Priority for colors highlights, works on vim8 and neovim >= 0.6.0

links.tooltip.description: Show tooltip of link under cursor on CursorHold, neovim only

diagnostic.enable.description: Set to false to disable diagnostic display

diagnostic.highlighLimit.description: Limit count for highlighted diagnostics, too many diagnostic highlights could make vim stop responding

diagnostic.highlightPriority.description: Priority for diagnostic highlights, works on vim8 and neovim >= 0.6.0

diagnostic.autoRefresh.description: Enable automatically refresh diagnostics, use diagnosticRefresh action when it's disabled.

diagnostic.level.description: Used for filter diagnostics by diagnostic severity.

diagnostic.messageLevel.description: Filter diagnostic message in float window/popup.

diagnostic.locationlistUpdate.description: Update locationlist on diagnostics change, only works with locationlist opened by :CocDiagnostics command and first window of associated buffer.

diagnostic.checkCurrentLine.description: When enabled, show all diagnostics of current line if there are none at the current position.

diagnostic.messageDelay.description: How long to wait (in milliseconds) before displaying the diagnostic message with echo or float

diagnostic.refreshOnInsertMode.description: Enable diagnostic refresh on insert mode, default false.

diagnostic.displayByAle.description: Use Ale for display diagnostics in vim, will disable coc for display diagnostics, restart required on change.

diagnostic.virtualText.description: Use NeoVim virtual text to display diagnostics

diagnostic.virtualTextLevel.description: Filter diagnostic message in virtual text by level

diagnostic.virtualTextWinCol.description: Window column number to align virtual text

diagnostic.virtualTextCurrentLineOnly.description: Only show virtualText diagnostic on current cursor line

diagnostic.virtualTextPrefix.description: The prefix added virtual text diagnostics

diagnostic.virtualTextLines.description: The number of non empty lines from a diagnostic to display

diagnostic.virtualTextLineSeparator.description: The text that will mark a line end from the diagnostic message

diagnostic.enableHighlightLineNumber.description: Enable highlighting line numbers for diagnostics, only works with neovim and diagnostic.enableSign is true.

diagnostic.enableMessage.description: When to enable show messages of diagnostics.

diagnostic.signPriority.description: Priority of diagnostic signs, default to 10

diagnostic.floatConfig.description: Configure float window style of diagnostic message.

diagnostic.filetypeMap.description: A map between buffer filetype and the filetype assigned to diagnostics. To syntax highlight diagnostics with their parent buffer type use `"default": "bufferType"`

diagnostic.format.description: Define the diagnostic format that shown in float window or echoed, available parts: source, code, severity, message

diagnostic.showUnused.description: Show diagnostics with unused tag, affects highlight, sign, virtual text, message

signature.enable.description: Enable signature help when trigger character typed, require restart service on change.

signature.triggerSignatureWait.description: Timeout for trigger signature help, in milliseconds.

signature.target.description: Target of signature help, use float when possible by default.

signature.floatConfig.description: Configure float window style of signature documents.

signature.preferShownAbove.description: Show signature help float window above cursor when possible, require restart service on change.

signature.hideOnTextChange.description: Hide signature float window when text changed on insert mode.

codeLens.enable.description: Enable codeLens feature, require neovim with set virtual text feature.

codeLens.separator.description: Separator text for codeLens in virtual text

codeLens.subseparator.description: Subseparator between codeLenses in virtual text

refactor.saveToFile.description: Save changed buffer to file when write refactor buffer with ':noa wa' command.

refactor.beforeContext.description: Print num lines of leading context before each match.

refactor.afterContext.description: Print num lines of trailing context after each match.

refactor.showMenu.description: Refactor buffer local mapping to bring up menu for this chunk.

hover.target.description: Target to show hover information, default is floating window when possible.

hover.previewMaxHeight.description: Max height of preview window for hover.

hover.floatConfig.description: Configure float window style of hover documents.

hover.autoHide.description: Automatically hide hover float window on CursorMove or InsertEnter.

dialog.rounded.description: use rounded border for dialog window.

dialog.confirmKey.description: Confirm key for confirm selection used by menu and picker, you can always use <esc> to cancel.

dialog.pickerButtons.description: Show buttons for picker dialog window/popup.

dialog.pickerButtonShortcut.description: Show shortcut in buttons of picker dialog window/popup, used when dialog.pickerButtons is true.

dialog.floatHighlight.description: Highlight group for dialog window/popup, default to 'CocFloating'

dialog.floatBorderHighlight.description: Highlight group for border of dialog window/popup, default to 'CocFloating'

dialog.shortcutHighlight.description: Highlight group for shortcut character in menu dialog, default to 'MoreMsg'

notification.border.description: Enable rounded border for notification windows.

notification.timeout.description: Timeout for auto close notifications, in miniseconds.

notification.marginRight.description: Margin right to the right of editor window.

notification.focusable.description: Enable focus by user actions (wincmds, mouse events), neovim only.

notification.maxWidth.description: Maximum content width of notification dialog.

notification.maxHeight.description: Maximum content height of notification dialog.

notification.preferMenuPicker.description: Use menu picker for message notification with actions.

notification.disabledProgressSources.description: Soureces that should be disabled for message progress, use * to disable all message only progresses

notification.winblend.description: Winblend option of notification window, neovim only.

workspace.openOutputCommand.description: Command used to open output channel.

workspace.openResourceCommand.description: Command to open files that not loaded, load files as hidden buffers when empty.

workspace.ignoredFiletypes.description: Filetypes that should be ignored for workspace folder resolve.

workspace.bottomUpFiletypes.description: Filetypes that should have workspace folder should resolved from base directory of file, or ["*"] for any filetype.

workspace.ignoredFolders.description: List of folders that should not be resolved as workspace folder, environment variables and minimatch patterns can be used.

workspace.workspaceFolderCheckCwd.description: Whether the current working directory should be used first when checking patterns match for workspace folder.

workspace.workspaceFolderFallbackCwd.description: Use current working directory as workspace folder when no root patterns resolved.

list.indicator.description: The character used as first character in prompt line

list.alignColumns.description: Whether to align lists in columns, default: `false`

list.menuAction.description: Use menu picker instead of confirm() for choose action.

list.interactiveDebounceTime.description: Debounce time for input change on interactive mode.

list.statusLineSegments.description: An array of statusline segments that will be used to draw the status line for list windows.

list.signOffset.description: Sign offset of list, should be different from other plugins.

list.extendedSearchMode.description: Enable extended search mode which allows multiple search patterns delimited by spaces.

list.maxPreviewHeight.description: Max height for preview window of list.

list.previewHighlightGroup.description: Highlight group used for highlight the range in preview window.

list.nextKeymap.description: Key used for select next line on insert mode.

list.previousKeymap.description: Key used for select previous line on insert mode.

list.source.diagnostics.includeCode.description: Whether to show the diagnostic code in the list.

list.source.diagnostics.pathFormat.description: Decide how the filepath is shown in the list.

list.source.symbols.excludes.description: Patterns of minimatch for filepath to execlude from symbols list.

list.source.outline.ctagsFilestypes.description: Filetypes that should use ctags for outline instead of language server.

cursors.cancelKey.description: Key used for cancel cursors session.

cursors.nextKey.description: Key used for jump to next cursors position.

cursors.previousKey.description: Key used for jump to previous cursors position.

cursors.wrapscan.description: Searches wrap around the first or last cursors range.

semanticTokens.filetypes.description: Filetypes that enable semanticTokens highlighting or ["*"] for any filetype

semanticTokens.incrementTypes.description: Semantic token types that should increase highlight when insert at the start and end position of token.

semanticTokens.combinedModifiers.description: Semantic token modifiers that should have highlight combined with syntax highlights.

tree.key.toggle.description: Trigger key to toggle expand state of tree node, does nothing with leaf node.

tree.key.collapseAll.description: Trigger key to collapse all tree node.

tree.key.invoke.description: Trigger key to invoke default command of current node or selection.

tree.key.close.description: Trigger key to dispose the tree and close tree window.

tree.key.selectNext.description: Trigger key to select next item during filter.

tree.key.selectPrevious.description: Trigger key to select previous item during filter.

outline.detailAsDescription.description: Show detail as description aside with label, when false detail will be shown in tooltip on cursor hold.

outline.splitCommand.description: Window split command used by outline.

outline.followCursor.description: Reveal item in outline tree on cursor hold.

outline.autoWidth.description: Automatically increase window width to avoid wrapped lines.

outline.keepWindow.description: Jump back to original window after outline is shown.

outline.switchSortKey.description: The key used to switch sort method for symbols provider of current tree view.

outline.checkBufferSwitch.description: Recreate outline view after user changed to another buffer on current tab.

outline.codeActionKinds.description: Filter code actions in actions menu by kinds.

callHierarchy.openCommand.description: Open command for callHierarchy tree view.

callHierarchy.splitCommand.description: Window split command used by callHierarchy tree view.

callHierarchy.enableTooltip.description: Enable tooltip to show relative filepath of call hierarchy.

coc.preferences.enableMessageDialog.description: Enable messages shown in notification dialog.

coc.preferences.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes that coc.nvim should handle, default '10MB'

coc.preferences.useQuickfixForLocations.description:
Use vim's quickfix list for jump locations,
 need restart on change.

coc.preferences.extensionUpdateCheck.description: Interval for check extension update, could be daily, weekly, never

coc.preferences.snippetStatusText.description: Text shown in statusline to indicate snippet session is activated.

coc.preferences.snippetHighlight.description: Use highlight group 'CocSnippetVisual' to highlight placeholders with same index of current one.

coc.preferences.currentFunctionSymbolAut.description: Automatically update the value of b:coc_current_function on CursorHold event

coc.preferences.formatOnSaveFiletypes.description: Filetypes that should run format on save.

coc.preferences.rootPatterns.description: Root patterns to resolve workspaceFolder from parent folders of opened files, resolved from up to down.

coc.preferences.watchmanPath.description: executable path for https://facebook.github.io/watchman/, detected from $PATH by default

coc.preferences.jumpCommand.description: Command used for location jump, like goto definition, goto references etc. Can be also a custom command that gives file as an argument.

coc.preferences.messageLevel.description: Message level for filter echoed messages, could be 'more', 'warning' and 'error'

coc.preferences.bracketEnterImprove.description: Improve enter inside bracket `<> {} [] ()` by add new empty line below and place cursor to it. Works with `coc#on_enter()`

coc.preferences.formatOnType.description: Set to true to enable formatting on typing

coc.preferences.formatOnTypeFiletypes.description: Filetypes that should run format on typing. Only take effect when `coc.preferences.formatOnType` set `true`

coc.preferences.floatActions.description: Set to false to disable float/popup support for actions menu, won't work on vim without float or popup window support.

coc.preferences.promptInput.description: Use prompt buffer in float window for user input.

coc.preferences.enableMarkdown.description: Tell the language server that markdown text format is supported, note that markdown text may not rendered as expected.

coc.preferences.excludeImageLinksInMarkd.description: Exclude image links from markdown text in float window.

coc.preferences.silentAutoupdate.description: Not open split window with update status when performing auto update.

coc.preferences.renameFillCurrent.description: Disable to stop Refactor-Rename float/popup window from populating with old name in the New Name field.

coc.source.buffer.ignoreGitignore.description: Ignore git ignored files for buffer words

coc.source.file.trimSameExts.description: Trim same extension on file completion

languageserver.description: Dictionary of languageservers, key is used as id of languageserver.
